summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingBYOMA Hydrating Milky Toner works to quench dry skin while repairing and restoring the skin barrier. The milky formula hydrates, calms and soothes skin from first use, helping strengthen daily skin barrier function.
details: DetailsBenefitsA hydrating toner to soothe dry, dehydrated and sensitive skinProprietary Barrier Lipid Complex helps restore skin BarrierPolyglutamic Acid and Cica deeply hydrate and minimize TEWLDermatologist tested & approved skincareAlcohol & fragrance-freeGentle enough for daily useRecyclable bottlesClinically proven to provide all day hydrationClinically proven to reduce skin sensitivityClinically proven to protect and maintain skin barrierFeaturesFormulated with Barrier Lipids and a barrier-supporting duo of Polyglutamic Acid and Cica to lock in moisture across multiple layers of the skin and minimise TEWL skin is instantly transformed, delivering soft, supple, and radiant results.Key IngredientsBarrier Lipids help restore skin barrierPolyglutamic Acid and Cica deeply hydrate and minimize TEWLItem 2620406How To UseApply to clean, dry skin with hands and pat gently into face, neck and d√©colletage. Use AM + PM. Follow with your preferred Byoma serums + moisturizer.Precautions: Eye irritation.IngredientsAqua, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Dipropylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Panthenol, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Polyglutamic Acid, Pullulan, Saccharide Isomerate, Xanthan Gum, Centella Asiatica Extract, Gluconolactone, Sphingolipids, Sodium Citrate, Beta-Glucan, Tocopherol, Ceramide NP, Citric Acid, Carbomer, Ethylhexylglycerin, Polyglyceryl-3, Methylglucose Distearate, Tromethamine, Symphytum Officinale Root Extract, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Sodium Phytate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Methyl Glucose Sesquistearate, Cetearyl Glucoside.
how_to_use: Apply to clean, dry skin with hands and pat gently into face, neck and d√©colletage. Use AM + PM. Follow with your preferred Byoma serums + moisturizer.Precautions: Eye irritation.

reviews.headline: Red face no more! This WORKS!
reviews.comments: I work from home and noticed my face looked red on a lot of my calls. After 2 weeks of using this milky toner, my face appears balanced and the redness is gone!

reviews.headline: Mature skin age 47
reviews.comments: Unfortunately, this did not work for me which I am really sad. Positive note it is milky however I broke out on my face  20 minutes after I applied it. Ulta was great about returning it no issue at all. 3 starts for milky and ulta amazing service

reviews.headline: Wow!
reviews.comments: I love this toner! For someone with rosacea & super sensitive skin, this toner is truly amazing. No burning or stinging, just pure comfort. The toner also doesn't dry out your skin or leave it sticky like other toners. I use it with the Milky  Moisture Cleanser & finish my routine with the Moisturizing Gel Cream. At 61, I receive numerous compliments on how soft & smooth my skin looks.This isn't skincare - this is skinlove!

reviews.headline: best product!!!!!!
reviews.comments: this and the milky cleanser together is a chef's kiss! i have acne prone/sensitive skin and this feels so hydrating on the skin. it also makes my skin look super clean. truly one of the best products on the market when it comes to getting rid of acne

reviews.headline: BEST toner for dehydrated oily skin ü´∂üèº
reviews.comments: Ive been looking for a toner separate from my normal salicylic acid toner for the dehydrated parts of my skin and my skin SOAKS. THIS. UP. ‚ú® if you're having trouble finding a toner for your oily dehydrated skin, look no further. This product will exceed your expectations!

reviews.headline: Felt too "watery"
reviews.comments: I will keep shopping around for another similar product. This felt too "watery" to me. Not hydrating or moisturizing to me.

reviews.headline: so hydrating
reviews.comments: was recommended this by a friend and i love it! it is so hydrating and feels so silky and soft on my skin. my new go to toner!

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: So good under makeup and as everyday skincare

reviews.headline: Not Bad Not Good
reviews.comments: its a okay toner, don't see a difference might repurchase again because it didn't irritate my sensitive skin but i want to try some other milky toners 1st

reviews.headline: Absolute Toning Perfection | After
reviews.comments: I am completelg jn love with the MILKY aspect of this "Hydrating Milky Toner". This Byoma product can easily be considered a dupe for Hailey (Rhode-) Biebers' Milky Toner by her relatively new beauty company which is Rhode Beauty (which I'm sure was intentional on Byoma's part).

reviews.headline: So hydrating!!
reviews.comments: I love this toner so much, its so hydrating for those with oily skin! Its not sticky and absorbs into the skin within minutes. It also wears so well under makeup and other skincare products

reviews.headline: burning üî•
reviews.comments: I bought all of the byoma products but after applying this I fell a burning sensation I'm returning it but all there other products are very good on my skin just this one not must be a ingredient I have really dry skin

reviews.headline: The best toner
reviews.comments: I got into milky toners recently at first I was using Fenty, but I needed more and it was sold out, so I seen this one and for the price thought I'd give it a try. I absolutely love this toner! It leaves my skin so refreshed, hydrated, and glowy. I even find myself reaching for it over the Fenty. And for the price you can't beat it! I already bought a back up bottle. Definitely don't want to run out of this stuff!

reviews.headline: I thought I loved this..
reviews.comments: I started using this product several weeks ago and I thought it was great. But, a couple of days ago I started to gave a weird reaction on my skin (red bumps and slight burning) it took me 2 days to realize it was my skin all of a sudden having a reaction to this toner. I switched back over to my Dermalogica Active Toner & my skin has completed calmed down and cleared! Not sure what happened, but I'm disappointed for myself because if your skin takes to this well, I do think it's great and very hydrating under makeup!

reviews.headline: love/ hate
reviews.comments: I loved this product at first i looked forward to using it but after a couple months i stayed breaking out all over my lower face and neck and i decided to see if the milky toner was the issue and after 1 month i stopped breaking out. hate to see it go really but its not worth the breakouts:(

reviews.headline: Very Hydrating
reviews.comments: I bought this toner just to mix with my foundation so it didn't settle in the lines in my face.  After a few weeks I noticed my face felt was felt so much more hydrated and this was the toner was the only thing I had changed in my routine.  I will continue to use it

reviews.headline: i would most definitely buy this product again!
reviews.comments: i love this product!! i use it right after i clean my face and it makes it so smooth and super hydrated!!!

reviews.headline: A desert girl must have
reviews.comments: I love Tatcha Essence, but let's be real. It's not something that I want to pay for all the time. I have tried so many other toners and nothing comes close to this. After I cleanse, I add this to the palm of my hands and pat into my face. While I usually follow up with hyaluronic acid and my moisturizer, this is something that hydrates my skin alone without the use for anything else. For reference, I am 41 with healthy skin however, I live in the desert and this is just something I refuse to live without.

reviews.headline: Drink of water for my face
reviews.comments: Love this stuff, gave it a shot after the Thayers broke me out a bit. After years of battling acne and now makeup looking different as I hit my 30s, I tried to focus more on hydration of my skin over treating the acne. This product alone I feel has improved my morning and night routines. It feels luxurious to me without the luxury price tag, plays well with my other skincare, and doesn't seem to be breaking me out. In fact, I think focusing on hydration is helping my skin more than any other attempt previously. I really like this toner!

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: This product calms my face and hydrates it. I can't do without it. I love it so much and will be buying again.

faceoff_positive.comments: I have used this product consistently in the mornings for a few weeks now. I have always had sensitive skin that reacts/turns red to most skincare products, especially after dermaplaning my face. However, I recently dermaplaned and applied this product immediately after and did not have any redness or burning! I can tell that it really hydrated my face afterwards. I also use topical retinoids and struggled with my makeup pilling around my nose and mouth. Since using this product consistently and right before applying makeup, I can tell I don't get that pilling/dry look even after wearing my makeup all day anymore!! I really only bought this product to help with the dryness from my retinoids but I have been nicely surprised by all the additional benefits I have been getting from it!! I will continue to repurchase this product. The benefits, especially at the price point, are great and I am a BYOMA girly through and through now!
faceoff_positive.headline: Will continue repurchasing

faceoff_negative.comments:
I really wanted to love this product. Everyone raves about it and how amazing it is to help skin feel and look hydrated, plumped, and ready for makeup. The product itself feels really nice on the skin and does make my skin look and feel hydrated and plumped. I liked how it felt going on the skin and was never left with any sort of sticky or slimy feeling on my skin after using. The toner has a nice milky consistency and you get a lot of product for the price. Definitely would take me a while to go through a bottle and I was using it daily, sometimes twice a day (AM and PM). 

I already struggle with cystic acne around my jawline and on the sides of my face and chin, but since November of last year (2024) I noticed that it was becoming much worse. I started developing more cysts and as soon as those would clear, more would form. I even started to get them under my ears, which had never been a spot I would get them before. I randomly saw a TikTok about the Byoma Milky Toner being the cause of acne in some users, so I decided to test the theory and stop using it for a while to see if this was the culprit. Within literally a couple of days, I noticed the cystic acne diminishing and I was not getting any new cystic pimples. I have since stopped using the toner  and my cystic acne has improved drastically. I have no idea what ingredient in this toner causes my skin to freak out, but unfortunately it is not for me. 

I would still recommend the toner to others but would caution to test it out with your skin for a bit before deciding to incorporate it fully into your routine. Had I done this first, I would have saved myself money and saved my skin from the trauma of worsened cystic acne. This is still a great product but just was not for me and didn't work with my skin.
faceoff_negative.headline: Caused cystic acne for me
